GK19bankad1u:1454: śaśikiraṇamayaṃ <7> <7.maraṇāya pāśamiva> maraṇapāśamiva makaraketunā nihitaṃ kaṇṭhehāramunmocayantī, praharṣavihvalāntaḥkaraṇāpi kanyakājanaśahajāṃ <8> <8.ālambya> lajjāmivālambya śanaiḥ śanairavadat <9.śanairavadat> -ṭhajanāmi te garīyasīṃ prītim, kevalamakaṭhora-śirīṣa
GK19bankad1u:1457: sāhakāriṇyastāḥ, yāḥ svayaṃ sandiśanti samupasarpanti vā /
GK19bankad1u:1458: svayaṃ sāhasaṃ sandiśantī <1> <1.sandiśanti, diśantī> bālā jihnemi /
GK19bankad1u:1461: jaḍapraśnaḥ, tvayi garīyānanurāga iti veśyālāpaḥ, tvayā vinā na
GK19bankad1u:1469: -duḥkhadāruṇā syāmityati praṇayitā, jñāsyasi maraṇe prītimityasambhāvyameva <6> <6.jñāsyasi maraṇena prītimityasambhāvyamiti'>
